Plot: When war plagues a country and the only thing left to do is fight for survival, Jim Clark portrays a character who struggles with internal decisions of what course of action he should take....
Title: The Eleventh Hour
Writer: Aleksandar Ivicic (screenplay), Aleksandar Ivicic, Savo Ivicic (characters), Savo Ivicic (story), Salvatore Sabia (characters)
Actors: James Clark III, Jess Chizuk, Salvatore Sabia, Robert Woodley
